Package AcademicExchangePlatform.servlet

package AcademicExchangePlatform.servlet
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CourseApplicationServlet
    Servlet for handling course application operations.
    CourseSearchServlet
    Servlet for searching courses.
    CourseServlet
    Servlet for managing courses.
    HomeServlet
    Servlet for handling the main dashboard/home page functionality.
    LoginServlet
    Servlet for handling user login functionality.
    LogoutServlet
    Servlet for handling user logout.
    NotificationServlet
    Servlet for handling notifications.
    ProfileServlet
    Servlet for handling user profile operations.
    RegisterServlet
    Servlet for handling user registration.
    ViewCourseServlet
    Servlet for viewing course details.
